Mon, 15 Jan 2024 04:09:42 +0000 Paeroa will feature on Country House Hunters NZ tonight. Photo / Christine Cornege
Change is imminent to Hamilton City’s kerbside recyclinghttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/change-is-imminent-to-hamilton-citys-kerbside-recycling/EXEEV2FUMJBEZE5KNCS3SWQ56Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/change-is-imminent-to-hamilton-citys-kerbside-recycling/EXEEV2FUMJBEZE5KNCS3SWQ56Y/ Recycling changes across the country mean only plastic types 1,2 and 5 will be collected. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:58:46 +0000 "Hard to recycle" plastics are not going to be collected in Hamilton City Council's yellow recycling bins from February 1, 2024. Photo / Hamilton City Council
Waka Ama National Sprint Championships 2024: Thousands descend on Lake Karāpiro https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waka-ama-national-sprint-championships-2024-thousands-descend-on-lake-karapiro/YU4FRXIK5BFQLEHZGBIQNA7HZQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waka-ama-national-sprint-championships-2024-thousands-descend-on-lake-karapiro/YU4FRXIK5BFQLEHZGBIQNA7HZQ/ Malisha KumarThousands of paddlers descend on Lake Karāpiro for waka ama contests. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:42:41 +0000 The 2024 Waka Ama National Sprint Championships get underway at Waikato's Lake Karāpiro. Photo / Kate Durie
Auckland Zoo welcomes newest member after birth of giraffe calf standing six foot tall, weighing 60kg https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-zoo-welcomes-newest-member-after-birth-of-giraffe-calf-stand-six-foot-tall-weighing-60kg/LXQUD5A4NBBBTG3YEDYOKANPYI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-zoo-welcomes-newest-member-after-birth-of-giraffe-calf-stand-six-foot-tall-weighing-60kg/LXQUD5A4NBBBTG3YEDYOKANPYI/ Benjamin PlummerIt was a long 15-month pregnancy during which time Kiraka put on an extra 100kg. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:37:14 +0000 Kiraka the giraffe with her newborn female calf at Auckland Zoo on January 15. The calf was born on January 13, weighing 60kg. Photo / Auckland Zoo
Diver’s near-drowning at Pātaua in Northland prompts water safety message https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/divers-near-drowning-at-pataua-in-northland-prompts-water-safety-message/CNOWN7H2K5BV7OOGPDGDSQSPXQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/divers-near-drowning-at-pataua-in-northland-prompts-water-safety-message/CNOWN7H2K5BV7OOGPDGDSQSPXQ/ Denise PiperPotoz Morunga Rudolph cried when she realised how close she came to not making it home. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:30:00 +0000 Potoz Morunga Rudolph (inset) is thankful to her rescuers but wants to warn of the dangers at Pataua, after nearly drowning at the edge of Pātaua Bar. Photo / NZME
Watch: Kiwi saxophonist wows Queenstown crowd with epic Coldplay cover https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-kiwi-saxophonist-wows-queenstown-crowd-with-epic-coldplay-cover/HNE4EDYGYNG7HANDZUC2G3SPZA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-kiwi-saxophonist-wows-queenstown-crowd-with-epic-coldplay-cover/HNE4EDYGYNG7HANDZUC2G3SPZA/ Pierre Nixon'It was just the right vibe': Queenstown busker's magic moment. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:17:42 +0000 Twenty-one-year-old budding musician Eliott Allemand performs his saxophone cover of the iconic Coldplay track, "Viva La Vida". Photo / Eliott Allemand
Auckland rail network’s Eastern line re-opens after nine months of reconstruction https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-rail-networks-eastern-line-re-opens-after-nine-months-of-reconstruction/LUZJDACRR5DDNJPEBR6MQTAT3A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-rail-networks-eastern-line-re-opens-after-nine-months-of-reconstruction/LUZJDACRR5DDNJPEBR6MQTAT3A/ Benjamin PlummerAll stations between Ōtāhuhu and Britomart re-opened this morning. Letters to the editor: Don’t force te reo Māori on me https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/readers-views-dont-shove-te-reo-down-my-throat/WY3ZHGBPYZCSVNSOBXRLHRTLIM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/readers-views-dont-shove-te-reo-down-my-throat/WY3ZHGBPYZCSVNSOBXRLHRTLIM/ OPINION: Bay of Plenty readers have their say. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 03:03:00 +0000 Waka Kotahi NZ Transport Agency switched to NZ Transport Agency Waka Kotahi in December to give effect to a new Government policy that public service organisations should have their primary name in English.
Car crash closes Cambridge road and SH1B https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/car-crash-closes-cambridge-road-and-sh1b/43PCPSKF4BGA7MG5XXS6HF47SU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/car-crash-closes-cambridge-road-and-sh1b/43PCPSKF4BGA7MG5XXS6HF47SU/ A car crash has closed a rural road near Cambridge. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 02:59:58 +0000 The crash was reported to police at 2.50pm.
